page.title: 05SCHOOL LIFE IN THE 1980's
page.content: We go to Raunds St Peters CE Junior School and our headmaster is Mr D. Rockley. School starts at 8.50am each morning.We often do mathematics out of our Scottish Primary Maths Books. We have English nearly every day. We write poems, stories, do handwriting practice and spelling tests. Each day the first break is at 10.40am, then we have dinner at noon and dinner time break at 12.30pm which finishes at 1.15pm. Sometimes we have Environmental Studies and Religious Education in assemblies. The last bell goes at hometime, which is at 3.30pm. In the afternoon and after school we have different clubs for guitars, choir, gym, chess and recorders. We have many holidays like half term and then we have Christmas holiday and Summer holiday.We also have our own School outing to another part of the Country.
